name: Card Business
description: Business service cards with branding, media, pricing, and action buttons for RCS Business Messaging

components.name: Card Business
components.description: Complete business card with header branding, media, content, pricing, and actions

props.card: BusinessCard object with header, media, content, and actions
props.onAction: Function - callback when action button is clicked

designNotes: Header includes brand logo, name, subtitle, and eyebrow text
Media section supports 16:9 aspect ratio images/videos
Content supports title, description, feature lists, and pricing
Actions can be reply (gray), action (blue), or view (outline) types
Android variant uses smaller border radius and different fonts
Pricing section highlights cost with optional currency and period
Feature lists use bullet points with green accent color
Hover effects include elevation changes and color transitions

cardStructure.header: Optional branding section with logo, name, subtitle, eyebrow
cardStructure.media: Optional image/video with aspect ratio constraints
cardStructure.content: Title (required), description, features array, pricing object
cardStructure.actions: Array of reply/action/view buttons with callbacks
